content:
Your original thread is https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1443044

As said there are no support tickets for the Thunderbird email client. However for the subscription based products such as Mozilla VPN as it is done by zendesk and not on this support forum so if you were trying to also get support for Thunderbird that way then it was for the wrong product.

content:
Your thread is at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1443148

A easy way to see your past threads and replies is by looking at top right and hover over your name and then click on View Profile which will lead to https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/user/deborahfrancisco1990/

To reply to a thread, you scroll down to the Post a Reply box then type in reply and then click on Post Reply.
